item.title: By: iah
item.dc:creator: iah
item.description:
Hello!
I am a first year rabbinic student at HUC and am writing a paper on the intersection between liturgy and israeli poetry, focusing on Eliaz Cohen and Amichai. I will definitely site this article, but I was wondering which haaretz article you sited so I could site that one too.
thanks very much and have a great day iah
item.content:encoded:
Hello!

I am a first year rabbinic student at HUC and am writing a paper on the intersection between liturgy and israeli poetry, focusing on Eliaz Cohen and Amichai. I will definitely site this article, but I was wondering which haaretz article you sited so I could site that one too.

thanks very much and have a great day
iah
